title: Disasters in Space
overview:
Amazing behind-the-scenes stories of NASA 
catastrophes and near misses, many unknown to the public. The science of
 exploration is imperfect - sometimes NASA must learn the hard way: 
Incorrect metric conversions, reverse installations, deadly chemical 
spills, and a near miss that could have resulted in a massive rocket 
fuel explosion that could have wiped out a small town - and almost did!
